version_description:
- NEW: added a backup weather data server (ICE) should the main server (FIRE) be unavailable
- UPDATE: improved the accessibility of the weather sounds volume slider
- UPDATE: improved the accessibility of the switches in settings
- UPDATE: ice a

- NEW: Localised for Greek
- UPDATE: Notifications are no longer automatically cleared on launch of Weather Gods, giving you a chance to read 'missed' notifications
- UPDATE: We now show notifications even when the app is open
- UPDATE: Edit sche

UPDATE: We listened to feedback and have now updated to display the feels like temperature alongside the actual temperature
NEW: Voiceover users can swipe down with three fingers to change the god on the timeline
UPDATE: Small tweaks to localisation

- NEW: added a feels like temperature line to the weather wheel
- FIX: voiceover reading wrong value for daily low feels like temperature
New notification engine for push notifications. You no longer need to keep the app in the switcher!

- NEW: Full support for iPad in landscape
- NEW: Sunset notification
- NEW: Combined Weather Wheel charts
- NEW: Show device status bar
- UPDATE: Voiceover; current temperature in timeline
- UPDATE: Voiceover; fix for day high and low tempe
FIX: crash when rotating the device in the weather wheel

APPLE WATCH : NEW : Show day high and low on main screen
APPLE WATCH : NEW : Show today, tonight and tomorrow summary on main screen
APPLE WATCH : UPDATE: Improvements to the 48 hour timelines
APPLE WATCH : UPDATE : Big fixes and performance impr

- NEW: our smart weather conditions are now available in the widget
- NEW: voiceover users now have data for humidity, pressure and dew point via the Air God and timeline
- NEW: custom rotor actions for voiceover users allowing easy switching of day

NEW: Sunrise and sunset times in the weather wheel for voiceover users.
FIX: Follow me not working with iOS11.

Fully optimised for the new iPhone X

- NEW: Voiceover will announce the latitude and longitude coordinates for the current location. This is available on the home button at the bottom of the screen
- NEW: Voiceover will announce how many days aw

Our biggest update to date! We’ve improved, tweaked, polished, honed & fettled so many things to list them all would risk crashing Apple’s servers. The entire interface has had a major overhaul, cleaner, crisper & clearer, with a new font, and no
Bug fixes.

Apple Watch

Weather Gods on the watch is now bolder. brighter and more colourful!

Apple Watch Complications

We have lots of new complications for the different watch faces, including a dedicated voiceover complication. Complications a

Humidity

* Added humidity to the weather wheel
* Added humidity to the smart modular Apple Watch complication
* Added humidity to the smart Voiceover Apple Watch complication

Apple Watch Complication

* You can display location n
Bug fixes (app hanging on startup)

- GPS tracking on the watch complication has been improved.
- Fixed a bug whereby the weather data didn't always update when resuming the app.
- GPS location automatically updates when you resume the app, providing the currently selected location is

“​Hey Siri, what’s the weather sound like today ?” A big new update to match your big new phone, Weather Gods for iOS12 is here. Supporting all the new phones & the fabulous new Apple Watch, Weather Gods takes a step into the future with Siri shortcut
中文本地化

- Bug 修复
- 本地化更新

- 改善雨，雪和风暴通知
- 雨夹雪和冰雹的附加通知 - 在配置雨天通知时自动选择
- Bug 修复

- 改进雾的通知
- 改进希腊本地化
- 改进日本本地化

更新了什么？

现在可以在应用内，小部件，Siri 和推送通知中获得美国，加拿大和欧洲的恶劣天气警报。

新的 Siri 捷径，适用于天气预警和天气状况。

现在跟着我可以在您到达目的地时检查天气警报。

Voiceover 用户可以使用自定义转子操作在位置屏幕中启用和禁用恶劣天气警报。

Voiceover 用户可以使用自定义转子动作在位置屏幕中暂停和激活通知。

改进了什么？

位置屏幕现在显示哪些位置启用了恶劣天气警

更新了什么？

Siri 表盘

我们现在支持带有卡片的 Siri 表盘：

• 每日天气高亮
•上午，下午，晚上和隔夜天气高亮
• 适用于雨，雪和紫外线的每小时卡片
• 日出和日落
• 月升和月落

不要忘记添加天气神作为 Siri 表盘的数据源

自定义 的 VoiceOver 智能高级配置

• 您现在可以选择要包含的数据点

波兰语本地化

波兰恶劣天气警报

爱尔兰

最近更新

环境声音

新的天气神动画

改进了日出和日落动画

重写了天气轮，使其变的更加易用

附加的月球信息

天气要点-一种新的手表复杂功能，全天及时提供要点

许多小的错误修复和性能改进
许多小的错误修复和性能改进

我们已经将天气提供者更改为AerisWeather。

您现在可以从应用程序内添加Siri快捷方式（通过设置）

错误修复和性能改进
错误修复和性能改进
